examples.example: 我们要好好保护地球，让它一直保持美丽和生机。

translate.english: We should protect the earth well to keep it always beautiful and vigorous.

examples.example: 我们应该共同努力，让地球变得更加美好和宜居。

translate.english: We should work together to make the earth more beautiful and livable.

examples.example: 我们要像爱护自己的家一样爱护地球，让它永远充满活力与希望。

translate.english: We should cherish the earth like we cherish our own home, and let it always be full of vitality and hope.
